name: Neo Metro Takedown
description:
Welcome to Neo Metro Takedown. 

You are a Techno Agent from the B.R.A.I (Bureau of Rouge Artificial Intelligence). The A.I in the Neo Metro building known as GODMOTH  has turned on its staff. They are currently being held as prisoners inside the building with their lives potentially at risk. 

What does the A.I want? What is it's ransom? It's up to you, agent, to find out.
